content: get ready to crochet your new favorite summer garment - the **braided wheat stitch™ easy summer top** this beautifully textured piece features the stunning wheat stitch adding just the right amount of dimension and charm perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike this pattern is a breeze to make with only two seams needed to finish plus it s designed for sizes xs-5x with four length options so you can customize it to fit your style perfectly **this is a 4-in-1 pattern whether you love lace fingering dk or worsted weight yarn you re covered with written patterns for all four plus a handy guide to help you use any weight yarn you like ** a video tutorial showing the worsted weight version of the top is included with the pattern crochet hook i 5 5mm -
